description: Designed and implemented scalable frontend architectures for logistics and resource-management systems, optimizing application performance through techniques such as code-splitting, memoization, and rendering optimizations, while collaborating closely with backend, product, and operations teams to define technical requirements and delivery scope.

Led frontend architecture and technical direction for the companyâ€™s website and internal platforms, defining the frontend tech stack, project structure, and tooling (linting, formatting, build processes), coordinating development workflows, reviewing pull requests, mentoring team members, and working closely with stakeholders to translate business needs into effective technical solutions.

Implemented responsive and accessible user interfaces using modern frontend frameworks, integrated third-party services and APIs into client-facing applications, collaborated in agile environments with designers, backend developers, and product teams, and contributed to internal tooling and shared components to accelerate development across multiple projects.
